    • valueOf

      public static Scope valueOf(String name)
      Returns the enum constant of this class with the specified name. The string must match exactly an identifier used to declare an enum constant in this class. (Extraneous whitespace characters are not permitted.)
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the enum constant to be returned.
      Returns:
      the enum constant with the specified name
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if this enum class has no constant with the specified name
      NullPointerException - if the argument is null

    • getMask

      public long getMask()
      Retrieves the scope mask value.
      Returns:
      the mask

    • isBasic

      public boolean isBasic()
      Determines whether the current instance represents a simple scope, not a combination of several other scopes.
      Returns:
      true if the instance is considered basic, false otherwise.

    • included

      public boolean included(long mask)
      Checks if the mask provided as an argument includes the current object's mask.
      Parameters:
      mask - the mask to be checked
      Returns:
      true if the provided mask includes the current object's mask; false otherwise

    • included

      public boolean included(Scope scope)
      Checks if the current scope is included in the scope provided as an argument.
      Parameters:
      scope - the scope to be checked
      Returns:
      true if the current scope is included, false otherwise

    • of

      public static long of(Scope... scopes)
      Combines the masks of the provided scopes into a single long value.
      Parameters:
      scopes - an array of Scope instances whose masks will be combined
      Returns:
      the combined mask

    • getValue

      public String getValue()
      Retrieves the value of the enum in a string format.
      Returns:
      the string representation of the enum value

    • toValue

      public static String toValue(Scope scope)
      Converts the given Scope object to its corresponding string representation.
      Parameters:
      scope - the Scope object to convert; may be null
      Returns:
      the string representation of the Scope object if it is not null, or null if the input is null

    • forValue

      public static Scope forValue(String value)
      Converts a string value to a corresponding Scope instance. If the conversion fails, returns null.
      Parameters:
      value - the string value to be parsed as a Scope
      Returns:
      the corresponding Scope instance, or null if the value cannot be parsed

    • parse

      public static Scope parse(String value)
      Parses the given string value into a Scope instance.
      Parameters:
      value - the string representation of the scope to be parsed
      Returns:
      the corresponding Scope instance

    • toValues

      public static List<String> toValues(long mask)
      Converts a given mask to a list of string values corresponding to the basic scopes that match the mask.
      Parameters:
      mask - the input mask
      Returns:
      a list of string values corresponding to the matching basic scopes

    • forValues

      public static long forValues(Collection<String> values)
      Calculates a scope mask based on the provided collection of string values. The values that do not correspond to a known scope are ignored. Any scope is allowed, basic or non-basic.
      Parameters:
      values - a collection of string values, possibly representing scopes; if null, the result is 0
      Returns:
      the combined mask of scopes represented by the provided values
